name: gravity_reversed
prompt: Gravity reverses one morning, but only for people who tell lies. Cities turn into floating confessions.
decoded: That sounds like a fascinating scenario! If gravity reverses for people who tell lies, it would create quite a spectacle. Cities turning into floating confessions would be a surreal and surreal sight. It would be interesting to see how people adapt to this new reality and how their interactions and relationships change as a result.
